CheckTitle: Check if RDS instances have logging enabled.
Description: Check if respective logs of Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) are enabled. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any log types are not enabled.
Risk: Without proper logging, it is difficult to monitor, audit, or detect issues or suspicious activities in your RDS instances.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that appropriate logs (e.g., error, general, slowquery, audit) are enabled for your RDS instances to maintain a proper audit trail.
